DOC.brief_summary: Participants receive PegIntron injection pen ( Peginterferon alfa-2b ) Rebetol ( Ribavirin ) combination therapy usual medical treatment . The current study aim evaluate whether previously introduce , widely accept implemented educational program , represent additional effort everyday practice increase patient compliance , succeed achieve adherence rate treat participant similar extent demonstrate clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: Patient Compliance During PegIntron Rebetol Combination Therapy Chronic Hepatitis C ( Study P04690 )
DOC.criteria: Before inclusion , participant must inform must give consent use his/her anonymized health data relate his/her treatment Peginterferon alfa2b ( injection pen ) Ribavirin . According Peginterferon alfa2b/Ribavirin label .
